snippet.title: Can the San Antonio Spurs go from heartbreaking runner-ups to champions?
snippet.description:
Can the San Antonio Spurs go from heartbreaking runner-ups to champions? by SB Nation NBA Staff on Apr 17 2014, 11:08a
The Spurs finished one rebound shy of winning the title last season. Now, they enter the playoffs with the league's best record and as the prohibitive favorite to return to the Finals.

snippet.title: Bubba comin': Why Watson's 2014 Masters win is just the beginning
snippet.description:
Bubba comin': Why Watson's 2014 Masters win is just the beginning by Brendan Porath on Apr 14 2014, 9:00a
Bubba Watson put on a show at Augusta National last week, one we're going to see again in the future from a left-handed bomber who's playing a different course than everyone else.

snippet.title: Shabazz Napier will be one of the most divisive prospects in the 2014 NBA Draft
snippet.description:
Shabazz Napier will be one of the most divisive prospects in the 2014 NBA Draft by Ricky O'Donnell on Apr 8 2014, 1:25p
Is Shabazz Napier a first round pick after his remarkable run in the NCAA Tournament? The 23-year-old guard is bound to be one of the more polarizing players in the 2014 draft.

snippet.title: Masters ‘scripting’ -- Who is wearing what at Augusta and who gives a damn?
snippet.description:
Masters ‘scripting’ -- Who is wearing what at Augusta and who gives a damn? by Emily Kay on Apr 8 2014, 1:00p
What Tiger Woods was scheduled to wear -- and his uninjured colleagues will don -- for the Masters has become a big damn deal and we just want it to stop.
